body_html:
Hi all,
Sorry for the delay. It has been some time since I looked at this code so I might need time to refresh my memory.

In any case, can you help elaborate a bit more @LinJM? We do make use for previous attention information, e.g., this line here https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/seq2seq/python/ops/attention_wrapper.py#L1374. Does it answer?

body:
Hi all,
Sorry for the delay. It has been some time since I looked at this code so I might need time to refresh my memory.

In any case, can you help elaborate a bit more @LinJM? We do make use for previous attention information, e.g., this line here https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/seq2seq/python/ops/attention_wrapper.py#L1374. Does it answer?
